title: Xbox Games Showcase, The Outer Worlds 2 Direct Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.09.25
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Xbox’s Summer Showcase is getting a big Outer Worlds 2 breakdown, Razer pauses their laptop sales in the US, and some nice new PlayStation features!

- Friday, we kick off the Elder Scrolls Online Podcast: A Kinda Funny Gamescast Limited Series!
Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
- GAMESCAST - Tim and Blessing taking a Video Game Music Quiz

If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
- Today’s Gregway is being done by Bless.
